skills.name: Cube of Absurdism
skills.description: After deployment, stops attacking for 5 seconds, and at the same time puts all surrounding ground enemies to sleep (affected enemies are invulnerable and unable to act); When the skill ends, deals 450% ATK as Arts damage to all surrounding ground enemies

skills.name: Shears of Surrealism
skills.description: After deployment, immediately deals 400% ATK as Arts damage to all enemies within the frontal target tile; For the next 15 seconds, continuously attacks ground units in that target tile with Arts damage

talents.name: Misdirection
talents.description: When skill is active, ATK +18% <@ba.talpu>(+3%)</>, Block becomes 0 and gain Camouflage
